case.state: Alright, I'll play your game...
So Guzma saying that to me gives me the full legal authority to beat him to death, right?
Well, at least I'll be playing with one other normal girl.
Is that a mime?
Why is this tiny chef boy wearing a sea captain's hat and a cape?
This place is pretty nice. I haven't been swimming since I played in Dragonfly Pond as a little kid!
First a town with no street and just a street... What's this world come to?
Hmph. You boys had better behave yourselves.
Seems I still attract all the boys.
Let's try and ease back on the flirting while we're here. I get enough of that back home.
(Well, at least the one guy is kinda cute. Maybe I'll let him flirt with me. Just a little bit.)
All girls? That's much better, if you ask me.
We are going to start soon, aren't we?
~Player~...
Hee hee hee.
~Cards.text~.
Just ~cards.text~.

state.text: ~Cards.text~, ~player~!
~Player~! I exchanged ~cards.text~!

case.state: HA HA HA!
One... more... round...
Stare... longer...

state.text: It's good, but is it enough?
Ah! ~Player~ might lose if I have a hand this good!
Are all of you obsessed with me yet?
Just a few cards swapped out and I can frankenstein together a pretty decent hand.
This hand is so good I'm getting chills. It's like air is blowing through every hole in my body!

case.state: I would've be swarmed by boys at this point, if I was playing this back home...
Each of you could have the combined knowledge of every one of your ancestors and I still think some of you wouldn't be able to win this game.
Good cards just seem drawn to me.
With the amount of times boys have tried to win a date from me by winning a poker game, yeah, it's no surprise I have a hand this good.
I feel like there's a faint whisper in my ears, telling me all the right moves to make.
It's only a few rounds in and you're already looking at me like I have two heads.
If we were playing with chips, I'd probably call. Maybe fold...
Are all people outside of Kurōzu-cho as eclectic as you all are?

♫When you join your hearts and sing... We're an army of one, army of one...♫
Sorry, it's stuck in my head.

♫Everybody join hands now... Everybody join hearts now... We're an army of one...♫
Sorry, it's just so catchy!
About what I expected.
Things are going a bit slow for me. Still, I didn't bring much in terms of throw-away clothing items.
I thought about wearing my red turtleneck here, but I guess you're all glad I don't have an extra layer, huh?
Ugh. This hand is such a snooze fest. I feel like I could sleep forever.

state.text: Win or lose? It's an endless cycle...
When I finally have ~player~ in my arms...
I know you're all thinking "why ~player~?" ~human.ifmale(He|She)~ haven't said anything yet!". Well, clearly you haven't seen how amazing their many, many qualities are.
This hand should probably keep my game from spiraling out of control.
Oh ~player~! I remembered where I can get a device to help you stare at me! You won't be able to look away as long as you like having eardrums!

case.state: Hee hee...
No... control...
Spiral, spiral, spiral!
He he he...
You... were... right... Nanoko... Don't wanna... go...
Maybe I won't last long after all?
You're all better at this game than idiot school boys, if that mean anything...
I get bad hands, too. So, I'd rather not hear any rumors that I cheated here.
I can't do many more rounds before I'll have to strip my dress.
Ugh. I could swear I'm cursed.
Ugh, Is there a clogged drain around here? It just sounds like someone... erm excuse me... something is stuck in a pipe near here.
(Stupid scar always makes people stare at me. Feels like I'm some monster with a twenty-foot neck or something.)

state.text: I'm gonna throw the round! If I do lose, you have to tell me one thing about yourself, ~player~! Anything! Hobby, personal interest, ...a personality trait!
I'll lose for you, ~player~! This hand'll do it!
Do you want to see me naked, ~player~?
~Player~'s mysterious personality makes me so excited to strip!

case.state: Fail! Hraaah!
Lose for ~player~...
~Player~...
Hisssssss...
Hmmm... Recently, I've been hearing a lot about Amigara Fault. I haven't been there myself, but it seems everyone who's in there has been sucked in by the mysterious rock patterns.
I was a pretty big Yuu Kanade fan when she was popular. I went to one of her concerts and she smashed her head open. Kinda intense stuff.
My scar has attracted some freaks, but I think you're a new low, Plunger Boy.
N-no one's ever treated me like this, ~player~! You'll see! I'll make you care about me!
(It's strange that ~player~ didn't mention my scar... or anything else, for that matter. I'm sure ~player~ will say something to me next time I strip...)
Stay out of this Nanoko-chan! You're just trying to get in my way!
~Player~... be... mine...
Gee thanks. Do you treat all the girls like this or am I special?
Do you want to win, ~player~? But if you lose... then I can feel your naked embrace...
Have the rumors about me spread that quickly, Meia? Yes, I do have a scar I'm not particularly proud of showing...
I don't know where you'd know me from, Nanoko-chan. I barely leave my hometown, as is.
Hmph. The clasp on this always gets stuck for some reason.
The center of attention, again. I haven't been too uptight, have I ~player~? ...~Player~?
Please answer me! I've never felt this way before! ~Player~!
~Player~! Watch me! Think of me! Want me!
Am I pretty, ~player~? Tell me I'm pretty!
Feel the pull, ~player~...
Really, ~player~? No comment yet? Nothing? Nothing at all?
My... eye...
Hm? Oh, the scar... I got it trying to impress a boy when I was a little girl.
All the boys I knew couldn't stop thinking about me!
Of course, there are other ways to get your attention...
I don't see how having boys flock to me is a curse, much more than an annoyance at times.
Ha ha ha!
How do I look?
That boy is my friend now... Sometimes I wonder if this scar might actually have the power to attract boys...
Are you ignoring me, ~player~? Say something! Anything!
But now I know what it feels like! I can't stop thinking about you!
My ~player~...
Strip... ~player~...
Feel... me... ~player~...
He he he... Yes...

state.text: Can I keep whatever you strip?
Just rip them all off and embrace me!
Can't you feel it? The force drawing us together?
He's just standing there, sexily!
W-wait... ~player~... you aren't just a mute are you?
With me, you'll never have to move again! I can mouth feed you everything so you won't even have to chew!

Did you fall from heaven? 'Cause I want to see you do it! Rise up and fall again and again and again and again and again and again and again and again and again and again and again and again and again and again and again and again and again and again and again and again and again!
I'm going to peel back every last one of your layers until I see what's at your core...
That is a car... that's a car...

case.state: Are you going to remove anything interesting?
Oh joy...
Alright, I'll try to be nice for this one. Maybe...
Well? Don't just stand there like you're stuck to the Earth?
How about a grand gesture? Like something from Wintertime for Rene?

state.text: Does he have your attention, ~player~? Are you only into men? Both?

It's kinda cute that you still think you have a chance to win.
Ugh! This is pointless!
Good to know that boys being dumb isn't just a thing back home.

case.state: Won't... stop... me...
Sucked... in...
~Player~ is mine!
Love... me...

state.text: Does the scar only work on boys?
Do you want me, ~player~? If you did, you'd strip for me.

Why won't you just speak! Why...
Even if I don't get to hear you speak, I'll get to see every inch of you!
I'm imagining you all oiled up. Oil dripping all over you, through your clothing, and coming out of your pores!

case.state: Wow, twice in a row. You mused be cursed!

state.text: Do you mean to stand in my way?

Just make it good. But not too good!

case.state: What are the rules for a tie, anyways?

state.text: A tie! This must mean something! Don't you think so, ~player~?

case.state: TIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIE?

state.text: Around and around we go... Does this stuff never end?

case.state: Are we moving on now?

state.text: Do you want to win, ~player~? I'll strip ~name~ naked for you!

case.state: If the girls at school flocked to me like the boys do, I'd treat them just the same.

(It's kinda strange that ~player~ isn't talking. Have they rejected me?)

state.text: You're getting in ~player~'s way!
Should I steal ~name~'s ~clothing~ for you, ~player~?

case.state: There's always next turn...
You haven't heard any rumors about me, have you?

That's nice...
(I hope people aren't put off by my scar.)

state.text: Are you stalling?

case.state: You boys are no better than mosquitoes.
You might as well be a slug. Pick up the pace!

state.text: How about instead of stripping you and me step out for a while? You go ahead, I'll catch up in a minute.

case.state: Ho hum. How uneventful.
Did you only come here to see naked girls? You're pathetic.
Very nice. Now, how about you go home and write a letter to yourself about how good you were at strip poker and just keep sending them again and again until you believe you have friends.

state.text: Boring, boring, boring.
Ugh... I think you gave me a headache.

case.state: If you were trying to hide something, this was the wrong game to play.
I think I've seen Kirie wear something like your ~clothing~. Not that she's been hanging out with me since the rumors started...

state.text: Are you trying to distract ~player~?
Back in Kurōzu-cho, there weren't many pretty girls. So maybe I just didn't have much competition?

case.state: ~clothing.ifPlural(Do|Does)~ your ~clothing~ drive the boys wild? I might get something similar either way.

Excellent.

state.text: ~Player~ wants to win... But that means seeing the others naked...

case.state: Well... there's some merit to taking off your ~clothing~.

state.text: Have I not made myself explicit with my thoughts on boys by this point?

case.state: You want a compliment? Fine. Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ tacky and you look somewhat better now...

state.text: (Would dating ~name~ get ~player~ jealous? Hmmm...)

(Maybe if ~name~ and ~player~ become friends, I can get ~name~ to invite ~player~ somewhere. So, once ~player~ and I start talking, I start seducing them. By the end of our conversation, ~player~ will love me without a shadow of a doubt and then we can be together! Unless ~player~ is a mind reader, which is ridiculous... Except they haven't said that they aren't, but then they might even still come if they know about the plan in order to see what I'm doing. So, I'll still be able to start my seduction and get them to care about me! There's no downsides! Ha ha ha)

case.state: Very nice, but I'm sure people won't be able to keep their hands off me when I strip my dress.

case.state: I bet you could be a hearbreaker, if you truly wanted to.

case.state: If you're going to try and show off, I'm leaving.

case.state: Boys...

state.text: I've been dreaming of this day for the past 5... 10 minutes!

case.state: I shot down the captain of the football team who could throw a perfect spiral and tear a phone book in half. Did you think you even came close to having a chance?

state.text: All boys are the same! I can barely stand to look at you!

case.state: Drr... Drr...

state.text: You just can't handle a rejection, can you?

case.state: Tempting... but no.

state.text: I just realized how ...attractive small penises are! Isn't that wonderful, ~player~? ~Player~?

case.state: Join... me...
